/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is lined with lush green trees that add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars of various colors are parked along the sides of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. Buildings of different heights and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds that add a serene backdrop to the busy street scene.
